ideas.title: New Workspace Doors
ideas.content: I think the ugliest part of the Workspace are the glass doors at the entry. I would suggest that we replace them with better looking ones and get rid of the notices posted on them, or redesign them

ideas.title: Fire extinguishers
ideas.content: Put a fire extinguisher in each office.

ideas.title: Decorate the office doors
ideas.content: Decorate the office doors

ideas.title: Open up space
ideas.content: Move the cabinet in front of the printer to the side, get rid of the small table and move the sofa to the wall. Big screen should go in the meeting room or hallway, preferably close to the glass doors.

ideas.title: Idea Space
ideas.content: Clear the usability lab, remove its door, make it an idea space/hangout

ideas.title: Touchscreen Welcome
ideas.content: Putting the touchscreen in front of workspace visualizing the HCC work

ideas.title: re-organization
ideas.content: removing the sofa from the kitchen and put some plants

ideas.title: hallway with bouquet
ideas.content: put a small bouquet in front of each office

ideas.title: Keep the sofa
ideas.content: Keep the sofa in the kitchen!!!! Since I could not reply to other ideas, I had to submit a new one.

ideas.title: Plants
ideas.content: More plants in the kitchen and maybe at the end of the hallway. Right now only two sad looking plants are in the kitchen.

ideas.title: Using the whiteboard
ideas.content: We should put the whiteboard in the hallway to better use... maybe add short news like papers that got accepted or when someone new joins the group

ideas.title: Kitchen Notes
ideas.content: In the kitchen are a lot of notes saying what to do and what not to do. Most of them look really old. We should renew them and check which are actually necessary.

ideas.title: Show off our accomplishments in research with wall display
ideas.content: We could show off our accomplishments in research with LED wall display in the hallway.

ideas.title: Cleaning stuff
ideas.content: A vacuum cleaner is an important requirement I guess. Staff may need to get rid of dirt that may occur suddenly on the carpet rather than to keep waiting for someone to come and clean.

ideas.title: Long collective debate
ideas.content: long vocal discussion in one room may disturb other researchers in other rooms. I suggest that, those who are planning  to go for long vocal discussion to do it in the room located in the middle of the building, in front of the stairs.

ideas.title: New floor covering
ideas.content: The carpeted floor could be replaced with some other, more modern floor covering (e.g. screed floor).

ideas.title: Kitchen improvement
ideas.content: Kitchen: 1. Clean the kitchen; 2. reorganize the kitchen and move the printer to the usability lab (create a building space, with all printers and other creative stuff); 2. buy new furniture for eating; 4. replace blue coffee machine

ideas.title: Hallway Improvement
ideas.content: Bring different colors on the wall and define spaces for different topics, for example, people space, project space, activity space, paper space, ...

ideas.title: Kitchen poster
ideas.content: Put a poster on the wall next to the table. Something inspiring and/or calming with no relation to actual research of the group.

ideas.title: Floorplants!
ideas.content: Plants on the floor

ideas.content: Heureka! - New idea!
